casebody.data:
WALKER, et al.
v.
DRIVEN HOLDINGS, LLC 395A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 11, 2018 David C. Boggs, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Colin R. Stockton, Attorney at Law, for Walker, Ken, et al. Michael W. Mitchell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Jackson Wyatt Moore, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Driven Holdings, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 6th of April 2018 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of April 2018."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 16th day of April 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
